quote: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.
author: Anonymous

quote: I used to think I was indecisive, but now I'm not too sure.
author: Anonymous

quote: Life is short. Smile while you still have teeth.
author: Anonymous

quote: I’m on a seafood diet. I see food and I eat it.
author: Anonymous

quote: I'm reading a book on anti-gravity. It's impossible to put down!
author: Anonymous

quote: Why don’t scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything.
author: Anonymous

quote: I told my computer I needed a break, and it said 'No problem — I’ll go to sleep.'
author: Anonymous

quote: I'm not lazy, I'm on energy-saving mode.
author: Anonymous

quote: Why do we tell actors to 'break a leg?' Because every play has a cast.
author: Anonymous

quote: I would lose weight, but I hate losing.
author: Anonymous

quote: I’m multitasking: I can listen, ignore and forget at the same time.
author: Anonymous

quote: My bed is a magical place. I suddenly remember everything I had to do.
author: Anonymous

quote: I have a lot of growing up to do. I realized that the other day inside my fort.
author: Zach Galifianakis

quote: I’m not great at advice. Can I interest you in a sarcastic comment?
author: Chandler Bing

quote: I always carry a knife in my purse, just in case we’re having cake.
author: Anonymous

quote: Some cause happiness wherever they go; others whenever they go.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I don’t need a hair stylist, my pillow gives me a new hairstyle every morning.
author: Anonymous

quote: I put my phone in airplane mode, but it’s not flying!
author: Anonymous

quote: If at first you don’t succeed, skydiving is not for you.
author: Anonymous

quote: I’m not arguing, I’m just passionately expressing my point of view.
author: Anonymous
